block.p: The best-selling titles for the Reader, Sony's portable tablet for digital books, have been mysteries, science fiction and thrillers. ''Next,'' Michael Chrichton's mindbending genetic romp, has been the top seller since the Reader's introduction last year.

With an 80-book capacity, the Reader is a natural for stocking up on a series. Sony Connect, the online bookstore for the Reader, offers 13,500 titles, including collections from such prolific writers as James Patterson, Tony Hillerman and Stephen King.
